name: Order of the Gauntlet
symbol: An upright gauntlet on a golden sun
beliefs: The Order of the Gauntlet is a militant order of paladins and clerics who serve as the righteous fist of the gods. They believe that evil must be met head-on, not through subterfuge but through direct and noble confrontation.
goals: Be armed and vigilant against evil
Identify evil threats such as undead and fiends
Enforce justice and punish the wicked

ranks.title: Chevall
ranks.description: Newly sworn member of the Order.

ranks.title: Marcheon
ranks.description: Proven warrior who has defeated evil.

ranks.title: Whitehawk
ranks.description: Trusted operative who leads small squads.

ranks.title: Vindicator
ranks.description: Champion of the Order, leading crusades.

ranks.title: Righteous Hand
ranks.description: One of the Order's supreme commanders.

benefits.benefit: Access to Order armories for basic weapons and armor at cost.
Healing services at Order temples at no cost.
Can request a squad of 1d4 + 1 knights for a mission.
Holy weapon provided on loan for a quest (e.g., +1 weapon with radiant damage).
Can mobilize the Order for a large-scale military operation.
